name: minidenticons
description: Super lightweight SVG identicon (icon avatar) generator
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.no-custom-element: cat minidenticons.min.js | sed 's/export const identiconSvg=.*$//' > no-custom-element.min.js
scripts.size:
echo "


Minified gzip size:	`gzip -9cn minidenticons.min.js | wc -c` bytes
Minified brotli size:	`brotli -Zcn minidenticons.min.js | wc -c` bytes
"
scripts.size-nce:
echo "
Without custom element:

Minified gzip size:	`gzip -9cn no-custom-element.min.js | wc -c` bytes
Minified brotli size:	`brotli -Zcn no-custom-element.min.js | wc -c` bytes
"
scripts.build: pnpm build-js && printf '_%.0s' {1..40} && pnpm no-custom-element && pnpm --silent size && pnpm --silent size-nce
scripts.prepublish: pnpm build && pnpm test && git push && git push --tags
